remarks: Support sets of functions expressed as abstractions.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 1-Feb-2015.)  Obsolete version of ~ suppvalfn as of 22-Apr-2019.  (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
fnniniseg2OLD $p |- ( F Fn A -> ( `' F " ( _V \ { B } ) ) = { x e. A | ( F ` x ) =/= B } ) $.
$d A x $.
$d B x $.
$d F x $.
